item.description: As my new boss told me, ‚Äúdata should be used, not hidden.‚Äù This tickles my journalist senses and my open government senses. I‚Äôve been writing about open data for more than a decade, so the opportunity to take a leadership role in it in Canada is too exciting to pass up.
